Subject: Before the storm: Hydras, Maxima, Proto
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=51137150
X-Yahoo-Profile: forevermegatron

Unmoving in a stasis pod, a female form of Maxima rested. Having had 
a difficult moment some time back.... Locked in stasis... awaiting 
for that opportune moment to reawaken. 

Hydras heard Proto request without said nothing, but a special 
complink was liunked with Maxima's pod. He ofted checked MAxima's 
status waitting to the moment when she will be ready to come back to 
action

Her stasis pod was left to where someone would have to awaken her. 
Hopefully none too soon. Often she was in stasis lock for a spell... 
only returning or in the public limelight when the most dangerous or 
disasterous moments in time was at hand. Bad luck sometimes followed 
her, be it bad luck to her comrades or to her enemies.
She laid there, in the pod... waiting.. 

Hydras consider that Maxima had been alot time out action... "It's 
time to awake the sleepy beauty of Predacons" thing Hydras and 
looking at Proto he said "Folllow me... It's time that you met oneo 
fo my closest conselours"
Hydras Walke trought several corritors and he arrived to the room 
where the pod rested. Hydras pressed some buttons and he waitted 
until MAxima awake

With the release of the connections from her form as they recoiled 
away.... 
She laid there a moment.. then her optics, more like eyes opened & 
flashed... 
A smirk upon her face as she looked up to first see Hydras... "Well, 
well... if the knight in shining armour hasn't come to awaken me.." a 
tad humourous... 

"Welcome to live... my dear assesine" hissed Hydras

swinging her long, metallic feline like legs over the side... she got 
up with a feline stretch, her metallic wings extended then contracted 
back into place as she looked over at the other bot. Cocking a brow. 
but said nothing. Looking back at Hydras.. 

"What's wrong my dear Maxima?"hissed Hydras "The cat eat's your 
thouge???"

cocking a brow at Hydras. "I am the cat." she purred in wicked 
sarcasim. Looking at Proto. "Nothing is wrong." Then returned her 
gaze to Hydras but said nothing. 
Instead... she stretched again.. that organic part of her that was 
stiff some... she'd still have to get used to it... 

"I see that you haven't lost your humor sense"hissed amused 
Hydras "But we havne't time to ironies and word games, Unicrons has 
sent his toys to erase us from this planet... and I need your 
services, my dear"

Turning utterly serious upon hearing Unicron. 
Ponders. "Will not be easy to stop him..OR his lackies... 
EmprzAnastazia:  "

Hydras hissed and said "Well well... the other choice is accept his 
invitation to dinner... as the dinner; to be honest I don't like it. 
SO we have to give a hand to MAxis in order to stop his minions and 
after that run our plans to destroy Unicron"

She smirked. "Sounds more than familiar. Having been there already," 
she softly hissed. 
Looking back up at Hydras. "Very well,"
Gazing at Hydras a moment... 

Hydras caught the gaze and said  "What's familiar my dear?"

"Unicron.. uniting with the Autobots.... that sort of thing." looking 
at Hydras with a grin. "Have you forgotten... I was there?" cocking 
her head to the side, her claw hands upon her awkward hips.

"Oh yesss, yesss"hissed Hydras while he touched her chin"Ahhh it 
happens severak centuries go.... how could I forget it????... and you 
should remember that your little aprenttice's husbance would be 
around there, and he swear revenge"

Cocking a brow. Striking her curiousity... 
"Oh?" Though a weak smirk upon her metallic lips as she looked back 
at him, pondering... 

"It seems..."hissed amused Hydras "That you have forgotten StarStorm"

Blinking a bit... somehow... the past was foggy. Furrowing her 
brow. "Unfortunately, it seems that some of my memory has been 
lost... 

"I see"hissed again Hydras "Wel unlucky he don't so you should be 
carefull with Prime..."

Her brow cocks a tad higher. "Oh? & what is it that I have done 
supposedly to Prime?"

"Prime it's mine... that's all that I have to say about him"hissed 
Hydras"bye now my dear, are you ready to go to action?"

Pondering a moment, then looking up at Hydras with a wicked grin. "Of 
course," she purred in delight. 

"That's it"hissed Hydras "Now how do you feel? ready for action?"
EmprzAnastazia: Smirking.... "I would think ready for anything."

"Good"hissed Hydras"Then we need to do a quick plan and Proto" said 
the male while he watch towards Proto"I'm afraid that you couldn0't 
kill any maximal by now... not until Unicron was defeated"

Looking at Proto with a calculating eye. 

"WE're loosing time here"hissed Hydras"We should move... to 'help' 
maximals"

"Of course," none to enthusiastic about it. But.. she would obey him.
